name: "The Bachelor"--the one with Bob Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Bob Guiney's home state?
questions.explanation:
Michigan.

	Bob owns his own mortgage broker firm in Michigan.

Dee Dee.

	Bob's sister Dee Dee is married and has one son named Jack.

questions.text: Which one of the following ladies was NOT cut from the first rose ceremony?
questions.explanation:
Brooke.

	Brooke made it down to the last six.  She was cut and didn't make it into the final four.

School Teacher.

	The controversial Leeann is an elementary teacher.  She was 25 years old when this series was made.

questions.text: Which one of the girls was voted by the other girls as MOST compatible with Bob?
questions.explanation:
Meredith.

	Yes, Meredith was voted most compatible.  On the day of her date she received the horrible news that grandmother had passed away.

questions.text: Which one of the girls was voted LEAST compatible with Bob?
questions.explanation:
Leeann.

	When the girls went in and voted they did not realize that the most and least compatible would actually receive dates with Bob.  They were all kind of shocked that Leeann got a one on one date with him.  Bob has been noted as saying that he could not believe that they were all crying because of having to vote for someone other than themselves.  He thought it was hilarious that they were all crying.

questions.text: Who were the three women that sang kareoke with Bob on their date with him?
questions.explanation:
Kelly Jo, Mary, and Misty.

	These three ladies dressed in lingerie and serenaded Bob.  If I recall correctly he kissed each woman that night.

questions.text: Where did Bob and Kelly Jo go on their overnight date?
questions.explanation:
Alaska.

	They went dog sledding in Alaska.

questions.text: Which three ladies made it to the top three?
questions.explanation:
Estella, Mary, and Kelly Jo.

	These three ladies each received the overnight dates with Bob.

questions.text: Which of the ladies did Bob choose to be promised to?
questions.explanation:
Estella.

	Estella won Bob's heart.  Many magazines reported that she resembled his ex-wife and she was in the same profession that he was in.  I guess she will be moving from Beverly Hills to Michigan.
